configurableConfig.description: When configured, passed-in paths are ignored.
configurableConfig.label: Folder

script:
if [[ -n "${target_path}" ]]; then
  ../.common/directory-children "${sort_order}" "${target_path}"
elif [[ "${#}" -gt 0 ]]; then
  ../.common/directory-children "${sort_order}" "${@}"
else
  echo "Without configuration, expected paths passed-in" >&2
  exit 1
fi
taskDescription: Returns contents of configured or passed-in folder
